1.text: Fill the spray bottle with 12  fl oz (350 mL) of warm water.

2.text: Pour about 2  fl oz (59 mL) of horse conditioner into the spray bottle.

3.text: Replace the cap and shake the bottle to combine the ingredients.

4.text: Pour 2  fl oz (59 mL) of fractionated coconut oil into the spray bottle.

5.text: Measure and add 2  fl oz (59 mL) of horse conditioner.

7.text: Fill the bottle with 12  fl oz (350 mL) of warm water.

8.text: Pour 2  fl oz (59 mL) of argan oil into a spray bottle.

9.text: Add 3 tbsp (45 mL) of leave-in conditioner.

10.text: Fill the spray bottle with 12  fl oz (350 mL) of warm water.

11.text: Screw on the cap and shake the bottle to combine the ingredients.
